publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-754# Des McNulty: Vale of Leven Hospital-That the Parliament notes that the future of the Vale of Leven Hospital is secure and that no services are under threat; regrets that comments were made which only created unnecessary anxiety among the staff and the local community, and further welcomes the additional capital investment of over £2 million to improve services at the hospital, based on the needs of the local area.
